title: How to Make Coronation Chicken Salad

steps.headline: Add the mayonnaise, milk, curry powder, fresh cilantro, and lemon juice to a bowl.
steps.description: Season to taste with salt and pepper. Whisk to combine.

steps.headline: Add the celery and shredded chicken.
Serve over lettuce leaves or as a sandwich spread.

text: Add the mayonnaise, milk, curry powder, fresh cilantro, and lemon juice to a bowl. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Whisk to combine. Add the celery and shredded chicken. Mix gently to combine. Serve over lettuce leaves or as a sandwich spread.
